content.raw:
# Current pull requests

* pull request #1934: Undo translate, rotate, snap and align for models and lights during simulation

* pull request #1945: Reset changes done through inspectors on model editor

# Future undo pull requests

## Simulation

* Inserting models and lights
* Deleting models and lights
* Scaling models
* Applying force
* Resetting world / models

## Model Editor

* Translate, rotate, snap and align
* Scale
* Add link / nested model
* Remove link / nested model

## Building Editor

* Reset inspector changes
* Inserting features
* Deleting features
* Moving / resizing features
